agriculture_services.name: Land Ownership Registration
agriculture_services.description: Official registration of farm land ownership with government authorities.

agriculture_services.name: Land Lease Registration
agriculture_services.description: Registration of leased farm land for agricultural purposes.

agriculture_services.name: Soil Testing and Assessment
agriculture_services.description: Evaluation of soil quality and fertility for farming suitability.

agriculture_services.name: Zoning and Land Use Approval
agriculture_services.description: Verification of farm land zoning for agricultural activities.

agriculture_services.name: Water Rights and Irrigation Permits
agriculture_services.description: Approval for using water sources for irrigation on registered farm land.

agriculture_services.name: Subsidy and Grant Applications
agriculture_services.description: Application for government financial assistance for registered farms.

agriculture_services.name: Environmental Impact Assessment
agriculture_services.description: Assessment of the environmental effects of agricultural activities on registered farm land.
